messages.subject: Re: a cry for perspective
messages.msgSnippet: My first time posting here.  Hi ya ll!  My 11yo plays in teams sports.  Her fav is softball.  I find myself getting overly involved and sometimes embarrassed
messages.messageBody:
My first time posting here. Hi ya'll! My 11yo plays in teams
sports. Her fav is softball. I find myself getting overly involved
and sometimes embarrassed by my own words that some how just pop out
of my mouth before my brain before my brain gets a chance to capture
them and edit. I could not tolerate sitting in the car (nor did dd
like it) so I bring a book. When I feel worked up, I read. It has
worked every time. Bring my BP back down to normal in no time.

I kinda worry about the mom who's son won't let her forget that she
missed two games in all those years. And you missed because you were
in childbirth or shortly after? I hope he is tongue in cheek teasing
his mom. Please. Will he be sensitive to a wife during and after
labor if he isn't to his own mom? He WAS teasing, right?
